msbt.message: So, you see all these markings on the informative statue? Yeah, they're called hieroglyphs. That means they're basically picturesthat are ALSO words. Totes cool, right? It makes me wonder how my name would be spelled.I know! I bet the hieroglyph would look like an ultra-stylish !
Ohmigosh! I love this valiant statue's wings.Just looking at them makes me feel like I could take off into the air and soar over this island, !

As a fashion model myself, all I can say is that the model who posed for the gallant statue knew his stuff. That pose! That look! What a pro! He must have been paid A LOT of Bells for that modeling gig.
I would have been sooo HYPED to have been the star of a famous painting like this!Honestly, I don't know how she kept such a straight face, .

The goddess in the middle of the moving painting looks just like I sometimes feel when I'm onstage. Don't get me wrong, I love being the center of attentionBut sometimes it IS kind of weird when everyone is staring at you, .
Just looking at this amazing painting makes me feel like something big is about to happen! It's so moody and dramatic Just like me right before I go onstage, !

Wow, I bet the little princess in this solemn painting had it good.I mean, she is totally the center of attention!I bet she was basically the pop star of her time. Yeah, back then, everyone totes wanted to be her.
Ohmigosh! That lady in the worthy painting is amazetastic! Look at her lead the charge! She reminds me a lot of me, you know? Bold, brave, and ready to take on the world, !

Aw. I know exactly how the pretty lady in this painting feels.Sometimes I just wish I could float away from everything that's getting me down, you know? I would totes give her a big hug if I could. And a towel. She might need that too.

OK, so first of allthis so-called "mysterious painting" should be called "totally freaky scary painting"! I mean, just look at that island! It's sooo dark and forboding.And second of all If Wilbur took me to an island like that, I would SO totally complain!

I totes dig how everyone in the calm painting is full-on relaxing. Self-care is soooo important, right? Look, I know I have a reputation for being an on-the-go celeb in the making But even I make sure to have a full-on chill sesh now and again.

You know what I love about the twinkling painting? All the stars, of course! I mean, sometimes I feel like I'm just a lonely star out there all by myselfBut then I look at this painting and it reminds me that I'm surrounded by stars. And they're beautiful too.

Ohmigosh! The big waves look SO realistic in this dynamic painting, ! I feel like the ocean might swallow me up at any minute!Yeah, I totes like looking at this painting, but I would never EVER want to experience it in person.

Did you know that there are tons more warrior statues like this one?And each one has its own tr√®s unique face.Wowzers, now that I think about it it must have taken the artist forEVER to make them all!

This ancient statue is totes cool and kind of spooky too.I mean, they used to think statues like this could protect you from bad luck and stuff. Which is awesome. But alsokinda weird. I mean, how does it do it? It's just a little ol' statue, . Yeah, I think I'm going to stand here a bit longer. Do your thing, statue! Keep that bad luck away from me!

That guy from the familiar statue looks like he's thinking super hard about something, . I totes get it. That's exactly how I look when I'm trying to come up with a new hit song. It is SO hard to focus like that. But when a song comes together, I know that suffering for my art is worth it!
What? For real? YOU were the one who brought this piece of art to the museum, ? Wowz! That is fabtastic! No, YOU are fabtastic!
